ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Research....not always necessary..
ygData.msgSnippet: AH, oops, will go hide back in my corner now. :) ... _________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get your free @yahoo.com address
ygData.messageBody:
AH, oops, will go hide back in my corner now. :)

--- Rob Berryhill <racefan@...> wrote:
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> You are thinking of the level 4 spell Mesmerize.
> Mesmerization is the level
> 16 AE equivalent.
>
> Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr
> Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
>
> > Mesmerization a research spell? I have it now,
> bought it in Ak'Anon,
> > very useful spell btw, not many people really
> understand it.
> >
> > It does two things, stuns a mob for about 30
> seconds or until it takes
> > DAMAGE, very important there as you can still
> debuff the mob without
> > taking off the stun effect. Secondly, and most
> importantly, it ERASES a
> > mobs hate list at the moment its cast. Think about
> it.
> > I use it for soloing yellows all the time.
> >
> _________________________________________________________

> > Get your free @... address at
> http://mail.yahoo.com
